content.text: Match ends, Dinamo Zagreb 1, Lyon 7.
Second Half ends, Dinamo Zagreb 1, Lyon 7.
Éderson (Lyon) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Sime Vrsaljko (Dinamo Zagreb).
Éderson (Lyon) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sime Vrsaljko (Dinamo Zagreb).
Offside, Lyon. Éderson tries a through ball, but Lisandro López is caught offside.
Substitution, Dinamo Zagreb. Nikola Pokrivac replaces Mateo Kovacic.
Aly Cissokho (Lyon) is shown the yellow card.
Aly Cissokho (Lyon) has gone down, but that's a dive.
Goal!  Dinamo Zagreb 1, Lyon 7. Jimmy Briand (Lyon) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gueida Fofana.
Luis Ibáñez (Dinamo Zagreb) is shown the yellow card.
Luis Ibáñez (Dinamo Zagreb) has gone down, but that's a dive.

Foul by Bakary Koné (Lyon).

Bafétimbi Gomis (Lyon) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Jimmy Briand with a cross following a fast break.
